column5: Anyone know how much ice there is on Parry Sound, I can't wait to get the boat out!
Satelitte shows the harbour clear of ice...but I have some doubts. Hopefully someone can confirm that lives close by.

Most of deep bay has little to no floating ice but theres a decent build up at the narrows into the sound. I think itll be another week before everythings off our back bay...  Wayne, I suspect the sound is good to go but just to be safe give crazy Tony a call at Divers nook......705-746-9757

Ice breaker came into Midland yesterday and I've got a few days of work before I can play with the boat... so should be good by the time I can.  Mike... call the number Kyle supplied. He might think he's in Northern Alberta... but his heart lives in Deep Bay Parry Sound! LOL
Called and he said that it should be good to go after the weekend.
